name: Leather Armor
description: A light armor made from toughened leather. Flexible and quiet.

name: Hide Armor
description: Thick cured animal furs and pelts stitched together to a fine piece of medium armor. Offers modest protection.

name: Scrap Armor
description: A patchwork of metal plates, leather, and cloth cobbled together. This light armor provides minimal protection but is better than nothing.

name: Chain Shirt
description: A finely made chain mail shirt that offers moderate protection without sacrificing mobility. Ideal for disciplined warriors.

name: Chain Mail
description: A full set of interlocking metal rings providing solid defense. Heavy but reliable against most melee attacks.

name: Cloth Robe
description: A simple cloth robe, often worn by spellcasters. Provides no physical protection but allows free movement for casting.

name: Plate Armor
description: Heavy plates of metal protecting the entire body. Extremely durable, but encumbers the wearer and reduces mobility.

name: Shield
description: A sturdy shield made of wood or metal. Can be carried to increase the wearer's defense in combat.

name: Natural Armor
description: Innate protection provided by the creature's bodyâ€”thick skin, scales, or hide. Varies per creature.
